data.name: Battle of St Kitts
data.agents_sp: Fadrique Álvarez de Toledo Osorio, Antonio de Oquendo 20 Gall 4000 men
data.note: Many settlers escape to Mos Shore to cut logwood [brasiletto?] / See John A. Holm, PhD thesis for U of London, 1978, 'The Creole English of Nicaragua's Moskito Coast', pp 179, 315 /v Latimer 81
